wikipedia_page.main: Maurice Frederick Codner (27 September 1888 – 10 March 1958) was a British portrait painter. His portraits include those of Athene Seyler (1933), Evelyn Laye (1933), Sir George Robey (1935), Jean Batten (c.1935), Sir George Broadbridge (1937), Lord Alexander of Tunis (1946), Kathleen Ferrier (1946), King George VI (1951), Queen Elizabeth the Queen Mother (1952), Leslie Henson (1952), Gwilym Lloyd-George (1955) and Sir Albert Richardson (1956).

link_mentions.page: List of people who have lived in Hampstead Garden Suburb
response: *Maurice Codner - British portrait painter (lived at 26, Temple Fortune Lane)
